mapper.select: select employee_seq, employee_id, employee_name, email, fk_position, fk_department, position_name, department_name from employees_table join position_table on fk_position = position_seq join department_table on fk_department = department_seq where fk_status != 0 and employee_seq != #{loginSeq} and employee_name like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%' or email like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'
